resources.string: Submit log (tap to view detailed instructions)

"Displaying this screen means that you are using a beta version and the following issues may have occurred: \u00091. You used Bug Report to submit issues \u00092. Some apps or kernels crashed on your phone
Please make sure you are connected to a Wi-Fi network when submitting those issues. Our dedicated specialists will collect your submitted logs.
This app is a sub-module of Bug Report, and currently developed by the BSP team. The final appearance of Bug Report will be decided by the UI team.
Known issues: Logic error in this app may occur upon continuous issue submitting by users.
The zipped logs can be found at http://tj.letv.cn.
Logs can only be uploaded over Wi-Fi. If Wi-Fi is turned off, no logs will be uploaded."
Upload failed. Please try again later.
Unable to read log file. Upload failed.
Your log file is too big and hence has been saved locally for a valid period of 3 days. Please contact customer service as soon as possible.
"Offline log is running now, switch off when you don't need it."
Cleaning archiving logs now, functions suspended
Saving off-line logs status, please wait
